sections.heading: Hospital; establishment and control
sections.text: A city of the second class shall have the power to erect, establish, and regulate hospitals and to provide for the government and support of such hospitals.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 39, III, p. 201;Laws 1881, c. 24, ยง 1, p. 194;R.S.1913, ยง 5016;C.S.1922, ยง 4185;C.S.1929,
